descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

source.name: source
source.description: Pick where your data comes from, delivery or preview API
source.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

environmentId.name: environmentId
environmentId.description: The ID for the Contentful environment (e.g. master, staging, etc.). Depending on your plan, you might not have environments. In that case use "master".
environmentId.ai_hint: The ID for the Contentful environment (e.g. master, staging, etc.). Depending on your plan, you might not have environments. In that case use "master".

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: equal
options.description: Search for all data that matches the condition: {attribute}={value}. Attribute can use dot notation.

options.name: exclude
options.description: Search for all data that matches the condition: {attribute}[nin]={value}. Attribute can use dot notation.

options.name: exist
options.description: Search for all data that matches the condition: {attribute}[exists]={value}. Attribute can use dot notation.

options.name: select
options.description: The select operator allows you to choose what fields to return from an entity. You can choose multiple values by combining comma-separated operators.

options.name: include
options.description: Search for all data that matches the condition: {attribute}[in]={value}. Attribute can use dot notation.

options.name: notEqual
options.description: Search for all data that matches the condition: {attribute}[ne]={value}. Attribute can use dot notation.

options.name: order
options.description: You can order items in the response by specifying the order search parameter. You can use sys properties (such as sys.createdAt) or field values (such as fields.myCustomDateField) for ordering.

options.name: query
options.description: Full-text search is case insensitive and might return more results than expected. A query will only take values with more than 1 character.

options.name: rawData
options.description: Whether the data should be returned RAW instead of parsed

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'space' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'contentType' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'entry' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'asset' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'locale' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'contentType' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'environmentId'
IF resource == 'contentType' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'contentTypeId'
IF resource == 'contentType' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'entry' AND operation IN ["get", "getAll"] THEN SHOW parameter 'environmentId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'entry' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'entry' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'entry' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'entry' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'entryId'
IF resource == 'entry' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'asset' AND operation IN ["get", "getAll"] THEN SHOW parameter 'environmentId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'asset' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'asset' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'asset' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'assetId'
IF resource == 'asset' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'locale' AND operation IN ["get", "getAll"] THEN SHOW parameter 'environmentId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'locale' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'locale' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
